title: OnePlus Nord CE 2 is launching next week, and these could be its specifications and pricing
content:
The next OnePlus Nord phone is right around the corner. Dubbed the OnePlus Nord CE 2, it’s set to take the reins from the last year’s Nord CE as the company’s newest mid-range offering. We have been hearing about the phone for some time now, with leaked renders and specs giving us a fair idea

The post OnePlus Nord CE 2 is launching next week, and these could be its specifications and pricing appeared first on xda-developers.
description: In a tweet earlier today, OnePlus confirmed that the OnePlus Nord CE 2 is coming next week. Read on to know more.
